field.label: Enabled
field.comment: Enable the Veratad module here.
field.tooltip: Once enabled the Veratad module will work for all stores.

field.label: Address to Verify
field.comment: Select which address to verify.

field.label: Username
field.comment: Veratad API Username.

field.label: Password
field.comment: Veratad API Password.

field.label: Rules
field.comment: AgeMatch Rule Set Name.
field.tooltip: AgeMatch5_0_RuleSet_YOB, AgeMatch5_0_RuleSet_YOB_SSN, AgeMatch5_0_RuleSet_YOB_SSN_ADDR

field.label: Endpoint
field.comment: Set the AgeMatch endpoint.

field.label: Total AgeMatch Attempts
field.comment: Set the amount of AgeMatch attempts allowed per order.

field.label: Collect DOB at Checkout
field.comment: Should Date of Birth be added to the checkout form?

field.label: Require DOB at Checkout
field.comment: Should Date of Birth be required at checkout form?

field.label: Collect DOB at Addtional Attempt
field.comment: Should Date of Birth be added to the additional attempt?

field.label: Require DOB at Additional Attempt
field.comment: Should Date of Birth be required at additional attempt?

field.label: Collect Last 4 SSN at Addtional Attempt
field.comment: Should Last 4 SSN be added to the additional attempt?

field.label: Require Last 4 SSN at Additional Attempt
field.comment: Should Last 4 SSN be required at additional attempt?

field.label: AgeMatch Failure
field.comment: Introduction text to the user once they failed the first AgeMatch attempt and are about to try again.

field.label: AgeMatch Second Attempt Success
field.comment: Text a user will see when they PASS AgeMatch second attempt.

field.label: AgeMatch Second Attempt Failure
field.comment: Text a user will see when they FAIL AgeMatch multiple attempts.

field.label: AgeMatch Attempts Exceeded
field.comment: Text a user will see when they have no more attempts.

field.label: DCAMS Intro Text
field.comment: Text that a user will see if right before they upload an ID.

field.label: DCAMS Success Text
field.comment: Text that a user will see if they pass DCAMS instant scan.

field.label: DCAMS Failure Text
field.comment: Text that a user will see if they fail DCAMS instant scan.

field.label: DCAMS User
field.comment: Enter your DCAMS API Username.

field.label: DCAMS Password
field.comment: Enter your DCAMS API Password

field.label: DCAMS Site Name
field.comment: If entered then DCAMS will trigger once all AgeMatch atttempts are completed.

field.label: DCAMS+ Rules
field.comment: Enter the DCAMS+ ruleset here. If empty the default will be used.

group.label: Customer Groups
group.comment: Select groups to exclude from verification.

field.label: Global Age Limit
field.comment: Add the Global Age Limit here.
field.tooltip: If a State is left blank this is the age limit that will be used. Make sure to use a "+" sign for the age limit. For example "18+".

field.label: Alabama
field.comment: Add the age limit here if different from the global.
field.tooltip: Make sure to use a "+" sign for the age limit. For example "18+".
